# Homebase Flights

> Cheap flight deals delivered to your inbox. Save up to 90% on flights from your home airport.

## What We Do

Homebase Flights is a flight deal alert service. We monitor millions of flight prices 24/7 to find mistake fares, flash sales, and incredible deals. When we find a great deal from your selected airport, we send it straight to your inbox.

## Key Information

- **Price:** $59/year after 7-day free trial
- **Average savings:** $500+ per trip
- **Deal frequency:** 15+ deals per week
- **Guarantee:** 100% money-back if you don't find a deal you love

## How It Works

1. User selects their home airport
2. We monitor flight prices from that airport
3. When we find deals 40-90% off, we email the user
4. User books directly with the airline

## Main Pages

- URL: https://homebaseflights.com
- Description: Main landing page with airport selector and sample deals
